functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on family history and recurrence.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, the c.9976A > T mutation in BRCA2 exon 27 was detected in 3 unrelated patients, 2 with BC diagnosed at an age ≤ 40 years and 1 patient with OC.
